author: protolambda
content: This channel is here for anyone building Eth2 tooling, for debugging, data-science, or other purposes. Tooling is a great common-good, and something that can improve insight of developers to improve clients. This channel starts a bit as a catch-all, but if there is a clear need for something specific, we may open additional channels later.

author: protolambda
content:
Here is a list of many different tools we have. It may not cover everything, but should help you get familiar with the tooling ecosystem:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@protolambda/eth2_tooling

author: protolambda
content: Also, shout out to <@&739298725154783314>/bitfly, beaconscan/etherscan, <@!144468805697929216> , <@&595681771690000403> team, <@!604062686623432740> , and others (sorry if I forgot). Pretty much everything is open source, and it's been incredibly useful to a lot of us.
